author: abehazbunjr
title: Surface Abstraction Encoding
description: Counterfeits of real-world art are difficult to discern, as would be tokenized ownership verification.
solution: Abstractive Encoding scans real-world objects into tokenized ownership with mathematical proofs assisted by pattern-matching AI.
experience: I am a full-time Plutus student with two years of Cardano experience and 14 years of web analytics and managing large technical projects.
